summary: Mexican outlaw Zanti killed John Tobin's parents. John teams up with Dusty, also hurt by Zanti, to get the bad guy.
cast: John Wayne|Sheila Terry|Jack Rockwell|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Jay Wilsey|Yakima Canutt|Gordon De Main|Earl Dwire|Tommy Coats|Herman Hack|Arthur Millett|Artie Ortego|Tex Phelps|Lloyd Whitlock
keywords: straight male romances straight female relationship|b movie|b western|poverty row film|low budget film
director: Director: Robert N. Bradbury (as R.N. Bradbury)
title: Frontera sin ley
